snippet: Southwest Airlines revived a plan to increase its domestic fares on Friday, and other airlines are expected to fall in line.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column highlights some business travel trends for remainder of 2012; notes Southwest Airlines revives plan to increase its domestic fares, and other airlines are expected to fall in line.
lead_paragraph: Southwest Airlines revived a plan to increase its domestic fares on Friday, and other airlines are expected to fall in line.

headline.print_headline: Airlines Are Likely to Match Southwest’s Fare Increase
headline.main: Airlines Are Likely to Match Southwest’s Fare Increase
